title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions:
Introducing the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, the ultimate gaming keyboard for both enthusiasts and casual gamers. This keyboard combines the tactile click of a blue mechanical switch with the smooth membrane, giving you the best of both worlds in terms of responsiveness and comfort.

One standout feature of this keyboard is its OLED smart display, which allows for customizable gifs, game info, and even displays discord messages. Stay connected and informed without ever leaving your game. 

The SteelSeries USB Apex 5 is compatible with various operating systems including Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, ensuring seamless integration with your preferred gaming setup. 

Crafted with an aircraft-grade aluminum alloy frame, this keyboard is built to last. Its durability is further enhanced with IP32 water resistance, protecting it from accidental spills and ensuring long-lasting performance.

The per-key RGB illumination adds a touch of visual flair to your gaming experience. Customize the lighting effects to match your personal style and create an immersive atmosphere.

For added comfort during those long gaming sessions, this keyboard comes with a premium magnetic wrist rest. With full palm support and superior comfort, you can game for hours without any discomfort.

The dimensions of the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 are 900mm in width, 300mm in depth, and a slim 4mm in height, making it compact and space-saving on your desk. In inches, it measures at 35.43 inches in width and 11.81 inches in depth.

With its USB connectivity, this keyboard is easy to set up and use. Simply plug it in and start gaming right away.

Upgrade your gaming experience with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard. Whether you're a hardcore gamer or just looking to enhance your productivity, this keyboard is perfect for both gaming and general use.

Introducing the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard! This keyboard is perfect for both gamers and general users alike. With its hybrid mechanical switch, you can enjoy the tactile click of a blue switch combined with the smoothness of a membrane, providing you with the ultimate typing and gaming experience.

The keyboard features an OLED smart display, allowing you to customize gifs, view game information, and even receive Discord messages right on your keyboard. It is compatible with various operating systems including Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, ensuring that you can use it with your preferred device.

Crafted with aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, the frame of this keyboard is not only durable but also adds a sleek and modern touch to your setup. The per-key RGB illumination allows you to personalize your keyboard with a wide range of vibrant colors, creating a visually stunning experience.

For added comfort during long gaming sessions, the keyboard comes with a premium magnetic wrist rest. This wrist rest provides full palm support and ensures optimal comfort, allowing you to focus on your game without any discomfort.

With dimensions of 900mm (35.43 inches) in width, 300mm (11.81 inches) in depth, and 4mm (0.16 inches) in height, this keyboard is the perfect size for any desk setup. Additionally, it is IP32 water-resistant, making it resistant to accidental spills and ensuring its longevity.

The SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard requires a USB port for connection. Don't miss out on this incredible keyboard that combines performance, style, and comfort. Upgrade your typing and gaming experience today!

Introducing the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard! This keyboard offers the perfect balance of precision and comfort for all your gaming needs.

The switch type is a hybrid mechanical design, combining the tactile click of a blue switch with the smooth membrane feel. This provides a satisfying typing experience while also ensuring smooth and precise keystrokes. Additionally, the keyboard features an OLED smart display, allowing you to customize it with your favorite gifs, display game information, and even view Discord messages.

Compatibility is not an issue with this keyboard, as it is compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation. The frame is made of aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, ensuring durability and longevity. The RGB illumination is per-key, allowing you to customize and personalize the lighting to suit your style.

For added comfort during long gaming sessions, the keyboard comes with a premium magnetic wrist rest. This wrist rest provides full palm support and ensures a comfortable typing experience.

In terms of dimensions, the keyboard measures 900mm in width, 300mm in depth, and 4mm in height. In inches, it measures 35.43 inches in width and 11.81 inches in depth. The keyboard also boasts IP32 water resistance, protecting it from accidental spills and ensuring its longevity.

To top it all off, the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard requires a USB port for connectivity, making it easy to set up and use.

Whether you're a dedicated gamer or simply looking for a high-performance keyboard for general use, the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is the perfect choice. Upgrade your gaming experience today!

Introducing the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, a powerful and versatile keyboard designed for gamers and everyday users alike. 

Featuring a Hybrid mechanical switch, this keyboard provides the tactile click of a blue switch combined with the smooth membrane feel. This unique combination delivers an exceptional typing and gaming experience. 

The keyboard is equipped with an OLED smart display, allowing you to customize and personalize your keyboard with ease. Display customizable gifs, game information, and even receive Discord messages directly on your keyboard. 

Compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, this keyboard ensures compatibility across a wide range of devices and operating systems. 

Crafted with aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, the frame of the keyboard is both sturdy and durable, ensuring it can withstand even the most intense gaming sessions. 

The per-key RGB illumination adds a stunning visual element to your gaming setup, allowing you to customize and create your own unique lighting effects. 

The keyboard also includes a premium magnetic wrist rest, providing full palm support and comfort for those long gaming or typing sessions. 

With dimensions of 900mm width, 300mm depth, and 4mm height (35.43 inches width, 11.81 inches depth, and 0.16 inches height), this keyboard offers a spacious and ergonomic design. 

In addition, the keyboard is IP32 water resistant, ensuring it remains protected from accidental spills or splashes. 

USB port required for connection. 

Upgrade your gaming experience with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard. Perfect for both gaming enthusiasts and everyday users seeking a high-performance keyboard.
